_header: Saint Fabian by old daw goodman was inow
Subjects: saints’ lives; Fabian and Sebastian, saints, lives of
_description: Lives of SS. Fabian and Sebastian (longer version, 114 lines) in the South English Legendary — 24 lines (Fabian) and 90 lines (Sabastian), as in 4594

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEint fabian bi olde dawe good mon was InouȝAt rome he ladde
                    holi lif & to alle godnesse drouȝ…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Wende to þe Ioie of heuene þat last wiþoute
                    endeNou god uor þe loue of him ous alle þus sende

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint fabyan by olde dawe good man was Inouȝat rome he ladde
                    ioly lyf & to alle goodnesse drouȝ…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& wente to þat ioye þat neuer ne chal myssenow
                    Ihesus for seint Sebastyanes loue graunt vs heuen blisse
Bod779.Note: Saint Sebastian treated as separate piece.
Bod779.Attributed Title:
Seint fabian þe marter (f. 131); Seint bastian þe marter (f.
                        131v)

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint fabian bi olde dawe God man was y nowAt rome he ladde holy
                    lyf And to all godenesse drow…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…And syþþen he lette smyte of After al þat oþer
                    pyneAnd þus sent fabian þe pope broȝte his lif to
                    fine…
BodLauMis463.Note:
Imperfect; lines 1-18 only due to loss of folio(s); written in
                    half-lines.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint fabian in olde dawe a good man was I noughAt Rome he ledde
                    holi liif & to all goodnes drough…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…þus seint sebastian brouȝte his liif to endeIn to
                    þe ioye of heuen fro pyne he gan wende
BodTan17.Note:
Saints Sebastian and Fabian treated separately in this MS (i.e. this
                    treated as two entries).

OxfCCC431.First Lines:
Seint Fabian bi olde dawe god man was ynowAt Rome he ladde holy lif
                    & to al godnesse drow…
OxfCCC431.Last Lines:
…þus S[eint] Sebastian broȝte his lif to gode
                    ende& to þe ioie of heuene fro pyne gan wende
OxfCCC431.Note: Treats as two separate texts; missing lines 31-110.
OxfCCC431.Attributed Title:
De sancto fabiano martire (f. 7v); De sancto
                        Sebastiano martire (f. 7v)

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein fabian bi olde dauwe god man was InouAt Rome he ladde holy lif
                    and to alle godnesse drou…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…þus sein bastian broȝte is lyf to endeAnd to
                    þe Ioie of heuene fram pine gan wende
CamCCC145.Note:
Saints Sebastian and Fabian treated separately in this MS (i.e. this
                    treated as two entries).
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.15.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint ffabyan by olde dawe goed man was ynowAt rome he ladde holy
                    lif and to alle goednesse drow…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now lord Sebastian byde ffor vs him þat was of a mayde
                    yboreÞat we ffor non eorþlich dede ffram þilke ioye ne beo
                    ffor lore

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint fabian by old dawe goud man was ynowatte rome he ladde holy
                    lyf & to alle goude drow…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Þus seint bestian broȝt his lyf to endeIn to
                    þe Ioye of heuene mot oure saules wende

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEyn fabyan by olde dawe gode man was y nouat Rome he ladde holy
                    lyf and to alle godenesse drou…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
… þis seyn bastyan broȝte his lyf to hendeAnd to
                    þe ioye of heuene fro pyne he gan wende

BLAru42.First Lines:
[S[eynt ffabyan by olde dawe goude man was y nowAt rome he ladde
                    holy lyf and to alle goudnesse drow…
BLAru42.Last Lines:
…ffor here by leue is ryȝt and goud and ȝoure nys worth a
                    schilleÞer fore on þy soule by þenke ne by lef noȝt on
                    a stone
BLAru42.Note:
Lines 106-114 wanting. Folios are out of order, so text begins on f.
                        2v and continues on f. 1. Missing lines 72-90. Space left for
                    illuminated initial ‘S’, which was not filled. Text on f. 1 severely
                    damaged.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEyn fabian bi olþe dawe godman was ynowAt rome he ladde holi lif & to all godnesse þrow…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …þus seint sebastian hiis lif browte to endeto þe Ioie of heuene fram pine he gan wende
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum v” added to right margin by later hand (f. 7); this annotator assigns chapter vi to Saint Sebastian (f. 7v, left margin).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint ffabian  bi olde dawe god mon was inowAt rome he ladde holi lif & to alle gode he drow…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Þe seint sebastian brouȝte is lif to endeInto þe ioie of heuene vram pine he gan wende

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEynt fabian by olde dawe god man was ynoȝAt Rome he lad holi lif & to alle godnis droȝ…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Þus Seynt Sebestian is lif broȝt to endeNou god ve bringe to heuene þudir is soule wende
BLEge2810.Note: Treats life of St Sebastian as if a separate piece (ff. 8-9); ends “Amen.”

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seint Fabian by olde dawe good was ynoughAt Rome he ladde holy lyf
                    and to ech goodnes drough…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Thus seint sebastian broughte his lyf to endeTo the blisse of
                    heuene froms the pyne gan wende
TokyoTak54.Attributed Title:
De sancto Fabiano (f. 3v); De sancto Sebastiano
                    (f. 13v)
